name: Wurlim Frostking
aura: Increases Ally DEF in Arena Battles by 30%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on the ally with the lowest HP for 1 turn if the [Freeze] debuff is placed.
skills.name: Winds of Winter

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease C. DMG] debuff for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Places a 25% [Strengthen] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
